regcore.db package¶

Submodules¶

regcore.db.django_models module¶

Each of the data structures relevant to the API (regulations, notices, etc.), implemented using django models

class regcore.db.django_models.DMDiffs[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of Django-models as diff backend

get(label, old_version, new_version)[source]¶

Find the associated diff

put(label, old_version, new_version, diff)[source]¶

Store a diff between two versions of a regulation node

class regcore.db.django_models.DMLayers[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of Django-models as layers backend

bulk_put(layers, version, layer_name, root_label)[source]¶

Store all layer objects

get(name, label, version)[source]¶

Find the layer that matches these parameters

class regcore.db.django_models.DMNotices[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of Django-models as notice backend

Find the associated notice

listing(part=None)[source]¶

All notices or filtered by cfr_part

class regcore.db.django_models.DMRegulations[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of Django-models as regulations backend

Store all reg objects

Find the regulation label + version

listing(label)[source]¶

List regulation versions that match this label

regcore.db.es module¶

Each of the data structures relevant to the API (regulations, notices, etc.), implemented using Elastic Search as a data store

regcore.db.splitter module¶

Each of the data structures relevant to the API (regulations, notices, etc.), implemented as a ‘split’, writing content to both django and Elastic Search, but only reading from django

class regcore.db.splitter.SplitterDiffs[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of django+elastic search as regulations backend

put(label, old_version, new_version, diff)[source]¶

Write to both

class regcore.db.splitter.SplitterLayers[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of django+elastic search as layers backend

bulk_put(layers, version, layer_name, root_label)[source]¶

Write to both

class regcore.db.splitter.SplitterNotices[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of django+elastic search as notices backend

Write to both

class regcore.db.splitter.SplitterRegulations[source]¶

Bases: object

Implementation of django+elastic search as regulations backend

bulk_put(regs, version, root_label)[source]¶

Write to both

Module contents¶

Interfaces for each of the data structures relevant to the API (regulations, notices, etc.). When instantiating the interface, it returns the associated backend class instead (e.g. for django, elastic search, or the splitter backend).

class regcore.db.Diffs[source]¶

Bases: object

A level of indirection for our database abstraction. All backends should provide the same interface.

get(label, old_version, new_version)[source]¶

Documentation method. Return matching diff or None

put(label, old_version, new_version, diff)[source]¶

Documentation method. label, old_version, new_version:String, diff:Dict

class regcore.db.Layers[source]¶

Bases: object

A level of indirection for our database abstraction. All backends should provide the same interface.

bulk_put(layers, version, layer_name, root_label)[source]¶

Documentation method. Add many entries, with the root of the entries having root_label and all entries having layer_name and version

get(name, label, version)[source]¶

Doc method. Return a single layer (no meta data) or None

class regcore.db.Notices[source]¶

Bases: object

A level of indirection for our database abstraction. All backends should provide the same interface.

get(doc_number)[source]¶

Documentation method. Return matching notice or None

listing(part=None)[source]¶

Documentation method. Return all notices or notices by part

put(doc_number, notice)[source]¶

Documentation method. doc_number:String, notice:Dict

class regcore.db.Regulations[source]¶

Bases: object

A level of indirection for our database abstraction. All backends should provide the same interface.

bulk_put(regs, version, root_label)[source]¶

Documentation method. Add many entries, with a root of root_label. Each should have the provided version

get(label, version)[source]¶

Documentation method. Returns a regulation node or None

listing(label)[source]¶

Documentation method. List regulation versions that match this label, sorted
